Class TrainRI

java.lang.Object
  TrainRI
public class TrainRI
extends Object

A small but functional demo program that indexes a given text, or folder tree of texts, using RandomIndexing. In case of OutOfMemoryError the index so far is dumped in a well-behaved manner, unfortunately this is not the case (yet) when being prompted to abort (i.e. Ctrl-c). The settings for preprocessing and indexing are located in a separate properties files (default values are declared in class header).

Version:
2004-aug-04
Author:
Martin Hassel
